text.title: Network of Chinese major Internet companies and their subsidiaries
text.more:
In this graph, the color of nodes presents the type of the companies.
The color of edges shows the relation between them:
red - the current or previous employees created this company
green - the parent company invested this company
blue - both relations

Data source: http://www.17startup.com/
text.intro: This force layout shows the network of Alibaba, Baidu, Tencent, Sina, Shengda and their subsidiary companies.
